name: Anoop M. Namboodiri
content: Anoop M. Namboodiri Home Anoop M. Namboodiri Professor Center for Visual Information Technology IIIT, Hyderabad Anoop M. Namboodiri is a faculty member at the International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad, India. He is associated with the Centre for Visual Information Technology and heads the Biometrics and Secure Identity Lab. He holds a BTech and PhD in Computer Science and Engineering. His research interests include Biometrics, Machine Learning, Computational Imaging and Computer Vision. He also serves as the Chief Science Officer of DreamVu Inc. Research Publications Teaching Students Resources Presentations CVIT IIIT-H Address: F-26, KRB (CVIT) International Institute of Information Technology Gachibowli, Hyderabad, INDIA - 500 032Phone: +91-40-6653 1326 Fax: +91-40-66531413 Email: anoop@iiit.ac.in Last Updated: Aug, 2023
